extension.name: WordPress Multisite Latest Posts
extension.author: Rafael Corral
extension.description: This module will show the x amount of latest posts site wide.

field.name: moduleclass_sfx
field.label: Module Class Suffix
field.description: A suffix to be applied to the css class of the module (table.moduletable), this allows individual module styling

field.name: titleMaxLength
field.label: Max length of title
field.description: Display title up to a maximum length, followed by (...)

field.name: numLatestEntries
field.label: Number of latest posts
field.description: Number of latest entries to show.

field.name: introMaxLength
field.label: Max length of post
field.description: Display introtext up to a maximum length, followed by (...)

field.name: wrapIntro
field.label: Wrap post text at
field.description: Wraps the introtext at specified length

field.name: showReadmore
field.label: Show read more link
field.description: Do you want to show the reead more link to the post?

field.name: readmoreText
field.label: Read more link text
field.description: Display read more text. ie Click here to read more...

field.name: showAvatar
field.label: Show Author Avatar:
field.description: Show / Hide Author's avatar. Use this only if you are using JomSocial or Community Builder

field.name: display_images
field.label: Display images
field.description: This option won't strip images out of the post content. This will still strip images that have captions.

field.name: images_count
field.label: Amount of images
field.description: This will allow you to display an x number amount of images.

field.name: resize_images
field.label: Resize images
field.description: If the display images is enabled this option will resize images to the size specified below.

field.name: cache
field.label: Caching
field.description: Select whether to cache the content of this module

field.name: cache_time
field.label: Cache Time
field.description: The time before the module is recached
